Entries.Tue2: Which pictures should I give to Leah...?$0
Entries.Wed2: I think Leah is the only person that has ever liked my photos so much.$1#$b#Alex always says that photography is kind of boring...$2

Entries.Fri2: I have so many ideas now thanks to Haley's photos.$1#$b#I think I'm going to be painting non-stop the next couple weeks.$1
Entries.Sun2: I always saw Haley when she came to the forest to take pictures.$0#$b#I've never talked to her before, though.$0

Entries.Thu4: Maybe I should learn from Leah and start being more serious about photography.$0
Entries.Fri4: I should visit Leah again soon.$0

Entries.Tue4: I really want to paint another portrait of Haley.$0#$e#She has a golden ratio face...$4
Entries.Wed4: I've been really inspired lately thanks to the photos that Haley gave me.$1
Entries.Sat4: Haley's great. Do you know her well, @?$0

Entries.Mon6: I can't believe I've been living here for so long and didn't knew about the tidal pools!$0
Entries.Wed6: I shouldn't be saying this but...$0#$b#I prefer going to the beach with Leah over going with Alex.$0
Entries.Thu6: I finally have a photo with Leah!$1#$b#I'm going to treasure it.$0
Entries.Sat6: I can't wait to go to the beach with Leah again.$1

Entries.Mon6: Hey, @.$0#$e#Do you think Haley'd like to have a picnic?$1
Entries.Tue6: I'm glad Haley wants to hang out with me at the beach.$1
Entries.Fri6: Hey, @.$1#$e#I'm going to the saloon, will you come too?$0#$e#Uhm... Maybe I'll ask Haley to join us.$4
Entries.Sat6: Haley is coming to my house tomorrow to help me with some things.$1

Entries.Mon8: Hi, @.$0#$#I want to go to Zuzu City soon with Leah.$0#$e#There's this new shopping mall that has a temporary art exhibition.$1
Entries.Tue8: I never really thought about having kids.$0#$e#You know, I was kind of a child myself...$2#$b#But I think that Leah has helped me mature a lot.$0
Entries.Wed8: Hi, @.$0#$e#I always thought that I wasn't doing anything productive with my life...$2#$b#You know, I just hung out with Alex from time to time, took some pictures here and there. I didn't even have a job like Emily.$2#$b#But thanks to Leah now I know exactly what I want my future to be.$4
Entries.Thu8: Leah has talked to me about a photography contest going on in Grampleton.$0#$b#We’re going to choose the pictures later.$1#$e#...or I could directly send in a picture where she's the model, it would win for sure.$4
Entries.Fri8: Watching the sunset with Leah is one of my favorite things in this world.$4
Entries.Sat8: Meeting Leah has led to a major change in my life.$0#$b#Before, I used to despise rural life, but now I wouldn't move for anything in the world.$1
Entries.Sun8: One of the reasons why I still live here is because Leah loves the valley and it's a great source of inspiration to her.$0
Entries.spring_Mon8: Emily told me that there's a new merchant in the desert.$0#$b#Maybe he sells unique works of art by foreign painters.$0#$e#Leah and I should stop by one day.$0
Entries.spring_Thu8: Leah's hair is super soft.$0#$b#I love to style it in different ways.$1
Entries.spring_Sat8: I'm going to ask Leah to do a photo shoot on the beach.$0#$b#It's going to be so fun!$4#$e#And I'll also get to see Leah in a bikini...$4
Entries.summer_Wed8: Leah and I are going to get some ice cream later.$0#$b#You should come too, @.$1
Entries.summer_Fri8: Hi, @.$0#$b#I'm going to ask Leah to go to the beach with me later, when there's no one else.$4
Entries.summer_Sat8: The beach is my favorite place in town.$1#$b#Well, and also Leah's house...$4
Entries.fall_Mon8: Emily is teaching me how to knit.$0#$b#I want to make a scarf for Leah for the winter.$1
Entries.fall_Fri8: Alex and I are good friends, that's why people used to say that we were dating.$0#$b#I still hang out with him once in a while, but now I prefer to be with Leah.$0
Entries.fall_Sun8: I miss summer and going to the beach with Leah...$2
Entries.winter_Tue8: Hi, @.$1#$e#Don't tell Leah, but I've been saving money to buy a Lupini painting for her at the Night Market.$1#$b#She's going to love it!$1
Entries.winter_Thu8: I'm looking forward to another wonderful year with Leah.$4#$e#I feel like I'm a much better version of my past self now, thanks to her.$1
Entries.winter_Sat8: Leah has a fireplace at her place.$0#$b#I love to sit in front of it and cuddle with her.$4
Entries.summer_27: I usually would take tons of picture at the Dance of the Moonlight Jellies tomorrow, but I think this time I will just enjoy the moment with Leah.$0
Entries.winter_23: Today's a very special day, it's Leah's birthday!$1#$b#I have prepared a surprise birthday party for her.$1
Entries.winter_24: Hi, @.$0#$e#The Feast of the Winter Star makes me feel like I'm finally a part of this community.$1#$e#It was good talking to you, I have to leave now and prepare Leah's gift for tomorrow.$0

Entries.Mon8: I'd love to draw a portrait of Haley sometime.$0#$e#She'd be the most beautiful model ever.$4
Entries.Tue8: Hi, @.$1#$e#You know, it’s thanks to you and Haley that I was able to come this far with my art.$0#$e#You should come over and have dinner with us sometime, @.$1
Entries.Wed8: Hey, @.$0#$e#You know, I'd never move back to the city even though it was difficult to leave everything behind.$0#$b#I love living in the valley, and I have so many plans for Haley and me for the future.$1
Entries.Thu8: I've realised that when I moved here, I wasn't really trying to make new friends because I was still processing all the changes.$0#$b#But, now, I chat with everyone at the saloon, help Marnie with the animals and even have a wonderful relationship with Haley.$1
Entries.Fri8: I was afraid that I was rushing too much with Haley...$2#$b#You know that my previous relationship ended pretty badly and I had no plans to be with anybody when I moved here.$2#$b#But then Haley came and ruined my plans.$0#$e#I'm glad she did, I love her so much.$4
Entries.Sat8: My career as an artist was not going very well when I first moved here...$2#$e#Fortunately, Haley has always believed in me.$0#$b#She is really supportive.$1
Entries.Sun8: I usually see Jas playing near my house.$0#$b#It got me thinking about if Haley'd like to have kids anytime soon...$0
Entries.spring_Mon8: Hey, @.$1#$e#Haley and I have thought about putting on a joint exhibition.$1#$e#You know, we'd display my sculptures and paintings along with Haley's photographs.$0
Entries.spring_Thu8: Oh, hey, @.$1#$e#I was on my way to see Haley.$4#$e#Bye!$0
Entries.spring_Sat8: An old friend of mine from Zuzu City has told me that he's going to present his first art exhibition next month.$1#$b#I'm going with Haley, maybe she could met my parents while we're there.$1
Entries.summer_Wed8: Haley absolutely loves summer.$0#$b#Every day she calls me to go sunbathing with her.$1
Entries.summer_Fri8: On summer days Haley and I love to go for a swim.$1#$b#We usually go to the beach, but actually the river could also be a good option.$1
Entries.summer_Sat8: I should take my watercolors with me the next time I go to the beach.$0#$b#I'd like to do some quick sketches of Haley.$1
Entries.fall_Mon8: I've been having a terrible artistic block...$2#$e#I should go see Haley for some inspiration...$7
Entries.fall_Fri8: I love walking in the forest with Haley in the fall.$0#$b#The breeze is very pleasant and Haley enjoys taking pictures of the river.$1
Entries.fall_Sun8: Hey, @!$1#$e#I bought some wine from Pierre's for the dinner I'm having tonight with Emily and Haley.$1
Entries.winter_Tue8: I'm glad that Haley lives so close to me.$0#$e#This way I can visit her often, especially on cold days like this.$1
Entries.winter_Thu8: Haley doesn't like winter much, so I try to spend more time with her these days.$0
Entries.winter_Sat8: This year has been the best in my life so far. Seeing how my art reaches more people, being with Haley, having a good relationship with the other townsfolk... What's not to like?$0
Entries.spring_14: I've spent the last month painting a picture for Haley's birthday.$0#$b#It's titled 'My Sunflower'.$4
Entries.summer_10: Haley is going to bring her camera to the Luau, she's really excited.$1
Entries.fall_28: Seeing Vincent and Jas having fun at the Spirit's Eve yesterday made me think about having kids.$0#$e#I wonder if Haley has thought about it too...$4

Entries.Tue4: I'm glad Haley is finally starting to mature.$0
Entries.Tue6: Leah's house is located in a place with a lot of positive energy.$0#$b#Maybe that's why I see Haley happier lately.$0
Entries.Wed2: I don't know if Haley will be able to have a serious relationship...$2
Entries.Wed8: At first I wasn't sure, but now I clearly see that the souls of Haley and Leah were made to be together.$0
Entries.Fri4: I didn't expect Leah to be interested in Haley.$3#$e#She's always talking to Elliot in the saloon.$3
Entries.Fri8: Leah gave Haley a beautiful painting last month.$0#$b#We've hung it in the living room.$1
Entries.Sat2: Leah is a very nice girl, but I don't know if her soul will end up getting on well with Haley's...$2
Entries.Sun8: Haley has changed a lot since she started dating Leah, she seems like a completely different person.$0#$b#In the good sense, of course.$1
Entries.Sun6: Leah showed me some of her sculptures the other day.$0#$b#She is very talented.$1
Entries.Sun8: Leah has a really unique energy, I think she is a good influence on Haley.$0

Entries.spring.001: I should take more photos of Leah.$4
Entries.spring.002: Actually, the forest is a really romantic place.$4
Entries.summer.001: Leah, honey, could you apply the sunscreen for me?$4
Entries.summer.002: I'm glad that you showed me this place, Leah.$1
Entries.fall.002: I'm taking pictures to make a photo album for Leah.$1
Entries.winter.001: Before I had nothing to do in the winter and was so bored.$0#$b#I'm glad that now I can visit Leah anytime I want.
Entries.winter.002: It's difficult to stay still...$2#$b#But I'm doing my best for Leah.$4

Entries.spring.001: Haley wanted to take some pictures of the forest in spring.$0#$b#And I'm drawing some quick sketches of the scenery.$1
Entries.spring.002: Haley looks so pretty right now, should I paint her...?$4
Entries.summer.001: Be careful not to get sunburnt, Haley.$2
Entries.summer.002: Haley, what do you think of this coral? Isn't it too big?$2#$b#I'm going to draw it again...$2
Entries.fall.001: I love you so much, Haley...$4
Entries.fall.002: Hey, @.$0#$b#Fall colors are more vivid in Stardew Valley.$1#$b#Haley thinks so too.$1
Entries.winter.001: Oh, @.$4#$b#Haley and I were talking about something important, would you mind coming later?$4
Entries.winter.002: I'm painting a portrait of Haley.$1

Entries.59020017/f Haley 500/f Leah 500/w sunny/: 50s/94 39/farmer 1000 1000 2 Haley 93 39 2 Leah 104 33 0/skippable/animate Haley false true 280 30 30 30 30 30 31 24 24 24 24 24 27 27 27 27 27 24 31/pause 1800/playSound doorClose/move Leah 0 2 3/move Leah -6 0 2/pause 1000/move Leah 0 4 3/move Leah -3 0 3/pause 600/speak Leah "Hi, Haley!$1#$b#Taking some pictures, huh?$1"/pause 500/stopAnimation Haley/showFrame Haley 33/pause 600/speak Haley "Oh, hello, Leah.$7#$b#Yes, the forest is a good photographic setting.$0"/pause 600/speak Leah "Yeah, I also like to walk along the river to search for inspiration.$0"/pause 700/speak Haley "Oh, that's right, you were a painter or something, right?$0"/pause 600/speak Leah "Yes, I am.$1#$b#I also do some sculpting.$0"/pause 500/speak Leah "Actually, when I was in high school I was interested in photography.$0#$b#But my photos were more mediocre than anything else...$2"/pause 500/speak Leah "So now I'm focusing on painting and sculpting.$0"/pause 500/speak Leah "I bet your photos are better than mine ever were.$1"/pause 680/speak Haley "Oh, don't think that mine are impressive either.$0#$b#It's just a hobby of mine.$0"/pause 700/speak Leah "Let me see...$0"/pause 200/move Leah 0 -1 3/move Leah -2 0 2/pause 1000/emote Leah 40/pause 800/speak Leah "Come on, Haley! These are incredible!$1"/pause 600/speak Leah "I love how you play with light in this one.$1#$b#And the composition in this one is simple but very well done.$1"/pause 800/speak Haley "Really? Do you mean it?$1"/pause 600/speak Leah "Of course!$1#$b#You could be a professional photographer if you wanted.$0"/pause 500/emote Haley 32/pause 390/move Leah 2 0 2/move Leah 0 1 3/pause 600/speak Leah "Actually, I want to ask you a favor, Haley.$0"/pause 500/speak Leah "I've been running low on ideas lately...$2#$b#And I could really use some references.$0#$b#I love your pictures, so I was hoping that you could lend me some of them.$0"/pause 500/speak Leah "What do you think?$1"/pause 500/emote Haley 16/pause 500/speak Haley "Nobody has ever been so interested in my photography.$1#$b#I'll gladly give you all the photos you want.$1"/pause 500/speak Leah "Thank you so much, Haley!$1"/pause 500/speak Leah "I have to leave now.$0#$b#You can come by whenever you want, I'm usually at home.$0"/pause 500/speak Leah "Bye, Haley. I'll be waiting for you.$1"/pause 600/speak Haley "See you soon, Leah!$1"/pause 500/move Leah 3 0 0/move Leah 0 -10 0/pause 500/end dialogue Leah "Have you seen Haley's photos?$0#$b#They are amazing!$1"

Entries.59020018/e 59020017/f Haley 1000/f Leah: breezy/8 7/farmer 1000 1000 2 Haley 700 110 0 Leah 3 7 3/skippable/animate Leah false true 150 19 19 19 16 17 18 18/pause 1800/playSound doorOpen/warp Haley 7 10/move Haley 0 -3 3/pause 500/move Haley -2 0 3/pause 700/speak Haley "Hi, Leah!$1"/pause 680/stopAnimation Leah/pause 600/showFrame Leah 4/pause 390/speak Leah "Haley, I was hoping you'd come today.$1"/pause 580/speak Leah "Did you bring the pictures?$1"/pause 700/speak Haley "Yes, here you go.$0"/pause 390/move Haley -1 0 3/pause 380/showFrame Haley 29/playSound shwip/pause 500/move Haley 1 0 3/pause 1000/speak Haley "Do you like them?$1#$b#I chose photos from different festivals plus the ones of the forest.$0"/pause 600/speak Leah "They're just what I wanted.$1#$b#Actually, I started some time ago a series of paintings about the festivals of Stardew Valley.$0#$b#They're one of the reasons why I love living here.$1"/pause 500/speak Leah "I think they're somewhere over there, do you want to see them?$0"/pause 700/speak Haley "Yes, I'd love to.$1"/pause 500/move Leah 0 -1 1/move Leah 3 0 0/move Leah 0 -1 0/move Haley 2 0 0/move Haley 0 -2 0/pause 670/speak Leah "I painted this one the year Gus made his special salmon dinner for the Festival of Ice.$0"/pause 600/speak Haley "Oh, I remember that year, it was so much fun.$1#$b#You made a diamond ice sculpture, right?$0"/pause 750/emote Haley 16/pause 500/speak Haley "This is...$8"/pause 500/speak Leah "Huh...?$6#$b#I wasn't going to show this to you but...$6"/pause 500/speak Leah "Well, this is embarrassing...$7"/pause 600/speak Leah "This is a painting of the Flower Dance.$0#$b#You know, the year you wore that dress Emily made for you.$1"/pause 500/emote Leah 40/pause 700/speak Leah "I...$0#$b#I thought you looked more beautiful than ever...$4"/pause 580/speak Leah "And I just felt I had to paint you.$4"/pause 600/faceDirection Leah 1/pause 500/faceDirection Haley 3/pause 600/speak Leah "I hope you don't mind... I painted it without your permission...$2"/pause 800/speak Haley "Of course not, Leah.$0#$b#I feel very flattered.$4"/pause 800/speak Haley "Truth is, after the Flower Dance finished that day, Emily and I had a fight...$2"/pause 500/speak Haley "I don't even know how it started, but the dress ended up being ripped...$2"/pause 700/emote Haley 28/pause 600/speak Haley "And I didn't take any pictures at the festival because I was too excited showing off my dress...$2"/pause 500/speak Haley "So I'm glad that you painted it, this way I can recall the happy moments of that day.$0"/pause 600/speak Leah "It's terrible what happened to your dress...$2"/pause 600/speak Leah "Listen, Haley, you can keep it if you want.$0#$b#You know, as thanks for your pictures.$1"/pause 600/speak Haley "Really? That would be wonderful!$1"/pause 500/speak Haley "I have the perfect place to hang it!$1"/pause 500/emote Haley 32/pause 1200/end dialogue Haley "Leah gave me one of her paintings.$1#$b#I'm so happy right now!$1"

Entries.59020019/e 59020018/f Haley 1500/f Leah: Orange/41 23/farmer 34 20 2 Sam 48 24 2 Vincent 45 25 2 Haley 42 12 2 Leah 40 23 2/skippable/animate Leah false true 150 35 35 35 35 35 35 32 33 34 32 33 34/pause 1500/move Haley 0 11 3/pause 600/speak Haley "Leah!$1#$b#I'm so glad to see you here.$1"/pause 500/stopAnimation Leah/showFrame Leah 4/pause 500/speak Leah "Hi, Haley.$1#$b#In the summer I like to come to the beach and draw some watercolor sketches.$0#$b#And you?$0"/pause 650/speak Haley "I came with Alex, but he says he wants to be alone to work out...$2"/pause 600/speak Leah "You can hang out with me, if you want.$0"/pause 500/speak Leah "Actually, come with me, I want to show you something.$1"/pause 500/move Leah 0 -10 0/globalFade .006/viewport 800 1700/warp Haley 79 13/warp Leah 80 13/faceDirection Leah 2/faceDirection Haley 2/playMusic summer2/viewport 80 16 true/pause 1000/speak Leah "I bet you've never come here.$1"/pause 500/speak Leah "One day I was walking around looking for new landscapes to paint and I discovered these tidal pools.$0"/pause 700/speak Haley "This is so beautiful, Leah!$1"/pause 600/speak Haley "Let's take a photo, I've got my camera here.$1"/pause 750/move Haley 0 2 1/playSound sandyStep/addBigProp 80 15 106/pause 600/move Haley 0 -2 2/pause 280/speak Haley "Ready?
